title: Thinking About the Ontology of Social and Environmental Accounting and Management
abstract: How to deepen the connections between culture, Nature and society is a pressing issue confronting human communities in the modern Anthropocene. These connections are explored using frameworks from the debates between philosophical internalism and externalism. The aim of the framework is to make it a democratic and moral endeavour beyond the constraints of a narrow economic focus, for the betterment of all democratic citizens in environmental and social crises.
